segments.text: My eyes keep returning to the boy on the two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He is precariously balanced, reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs are visibly splayed, tilting backward at an alarming angle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks as though it could give way and tip over at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's body is stretched, adding to the instability of his perch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry about him losing his balance and falling backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A fall from that height, onto a potentially wet floor, could be serious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He could hit his head or break something, perhaps even the plate he's holding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me so angry that no one is supervising this dangerous stunt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The lack of adult oversight in this situation is frankly irresponsible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister stands nearby, seemingly unaware of the peril.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She is just focused on getting a cookie, completely oblivious to the risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just wish I could warn them or somehow stabilize that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is filled with such preventable danger.
segments.speaker: PAR
